SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GameLocalView

Class LocalModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GameLocalView.LocalModel
public class LocalModel extends Object
The class is used by the client to save the information of the current game. The class is created and saves the data contained in various messages sent by the server after each action. It is used to save the data that the client will see in its view. Other classes specifically created for this reason that are generated and used through this class are: LocalStationPlayer OtherStation PersonalStation LocalTable

    Field
    Description
    private List<Color>
    availableColors
    A list containing the available colors that the client can choose as the color of its pawn for the game.
    private String
    firstPlayer
    The first player of the game, so the player that will start placing and picking cards when the game starts.
    private String
    gameName
    Name of the game in which player is inscribed
    private ListenersManager
    listenersManager
    Attribute used to handle the listeners that listen and notify the view of changes or events generated during the game.
    private final Object
    lockTable
    Object used as a thread lock to do not permit concurrent modifications of the table.
    private final ArrayList<Message>
    messages
    List of Message containing the Chat messages arrived so far.
    private String
    nickname
    Nickname of the owner player
    private int
    numPlayers
    Attribute containing the number of players that can play in the game the client joined.
    private final ConcurrentHashMap<String,State>
    playerState
    The map contains the state of each player in a game: for each player that is in the game a State is saved to denote if that player currently active or inactive.
    private final ConcurrentHashMap<String,LocalStationPlayer>
    playerStations
    The attribute contains the Local Stations (LocalStationPlayer) of each player of the game the client is currently playing in.
    private final ConcurrentHashMap<String,GoalCard>
    previousGoalCards
    Map containing the private Goal cards and the public Goal cards (GoalCard).
    private final ConcurrentHashMap<String,PlayableCard>
    previousPlayableCards
    Map containing all PlayableCard that have been placed or picked so far.
    private LocalTable
    table
    The attribute denotes the table that the client will see.
    private ArrayList<String>
    winners
    At the end of the game the winners, represented with their String nickname, will be saved in this attribute.

  • Field Details

    • playerStations

      private final ConcurrentHashMap<String,LocalStationPlayer> playerStations
      The attribute contains the Local Stations (LocalStationPlayer) of each player of the game the client is currently playing in. The Map contains both the personal and the other player stations.

    • playerState

      private final ConcurrentHashMap<String,State> playerState
      The map contains the state of each player in a game: for each player that is in the game a State is saved to denote if that player currently active or inactive.

    • nickname

      private String nickname
      Nickname of the owner player

    • gameName

      private String gameName
      Name of the game in which player is inscribed

    • table

      private LocalTable table
      The attribute denotes the table that the client will see. After the message containing the table configuration is received (TableConfigurationMessage) the table is created and contains the information that the client can use to see the public goal cards or the cards to pick.

    • firstPlayer

      private String firstPlayer
      The first player of the game, so the player that will start placing and picking cards when the game starts.

    • lockTable

      private final Object lockTable
      Object used as a thread lock to do not permit concurrent modifications of the table.

    • numPlayers

      private int numPlayers
      Attribute containing the number of players that can play in the game the client joined.

    • previousPlayableCards

      private final ConcurrentHashMap<String,PlayableCard> previousPlayableCards
      Map containing all PlayableCard that have been placed or picked so far.

    • previousGoalCards

      private final ConcurrentHashMap<String,GoalCard> previousGoalCards
      Map containing the private Goal cards and the public Goal cards (GoalCard).

    • availableColors

      private List<Color> availableColors
      A list containing the available colors that the client can choose as the color of its pawn for the game.

    • messages

      private final ArrayList<Message> messages
      List of Message containing the Chat messages arrived so far.

    • listenersManager

      private ListenersManager listenersManager
      Attribute used to handle the listeners that listen and notify the view of changes or events generated during the game.

    • winners

      private ArrayList<String> winners
      At the end of the game the winners, represented with their String nickname, will be saved in this attribute.

    • getPersonalStation

      public PersonalStation getPersonalStation()
      To return the Personal Station.
      Returns:
      the element of the playerStations whose key is equal to the nickname of the client, so its PersonalStation.

      public boolean isColorChosen()
      To control if the client has already chosen its pawn color.
      Returns:
      a boolean that is true if the Color associated to the Client's personal station is not null.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String nickname, String anchorCode, PlayableCard cardToPlace, Direction direction)
      This method is called after a AcceptedPlacePlayableCardMessage is received Method used to place a card in a Station (LocalStationPlayer) given:
      Parameters:
      nickname - , the name of the player in which station we want to place the card.
      anchorCode - , the anchor card code of the card we want to place the card from.
      cardToPlace - , the card we want to place.
      direction - , the direction in which we want to place the card, given the anchor card.

      To place the initial card given:
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player that wants its initial card to be placed.
      initialCard - the PlayableCard containing the initialcard the user wants to place.

    • finishedLocalSetup

      private boolean finishedLocalSetup()
      To check if the client has finished its local setup actions: choosing color, setting the private goal and placing the initial card.
      Returns:
      a boolean containing True if the setup phase is ended.

    • isCardPlaceablePersonalStation

      public boolean isCardPlaceablePersonalStation(PlayableCard cardToPlace, PlayableCard anchor, Direction direction)
      To ask if a card is placeable in the personal station of the client.
      Parameters:
      cardToPlace - , the card the client wants to place.
      anchor - , the anchor from which the client wants to place the card.
      direction - , the direction of the cardToPlace from the anchor.
      Returns:
      a boolean containing True only if the card is placeable.

    • updateCardsInTable

      public void updateCardsInTable(PlayableCard playableCard, PlayableCardType playableCardType, int position)
      After a message AcceptedPickCardFromTable arrived. To update the cards in table after a card is picked, given:
      Parameters:
      playableCard - , the card that is now in the Table.
      playableCardType - , the type of the card that is now in the top of the deck.
      position - , the position from which the card was picked.
